name: Swimming Bird
description:
KEYS:

[DIR]/[TYPE]/[FREQ]/[M]/[F]=

{Q|W|E|R|T|Y|U}

{A|S|D|F|G|H|J};

[+]={RETURN/ENTER};

[-]={DELETE};

FUNCTIONS

ROTATE = [DIR]+[M];

FIRE = [TYPE]+[FREQ]+[F];

COMMANDS:

EXECUTE = [+];

DELETE = [-];

/*INFO

-Swimming is complex and takes practice to learn

-Queue actions by entering FUNCTIONS then EXECUTE

-Face target before FIRE

-Match target [TYPE] and [FREQ] when FIRE

-EXECUTE with empty input to confirm queue

-DELETE to remove commands

*/

/*

- 08/05/2014

- v1.1.0

- @thomasbowker

*/
